definition: Life is short, learning is limitless/Ars longa, vita brevis
pinyin: wu2 sheng1 ye3 you3 ya2 , er2 zhi1 ye3 wu2 ya2
simplified: 吾生也有涯，而知也无涯
word: 吾生也有涯，而知也無涯

definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
